Function Documentation

bool queryRegState ( bool  use_cgreg,
int *  response,
unsigned long *  cellID,
bool *  hasAct 
)

Query and parse registration state from +CREG or +CGREG.

Parameters:
use_cgreg use +CGREG or not
[out] response pointer to the response data
[out] cellID pointer to the response cellID
[out] hasAct pointer to whether response including a valid "AcT" info
Returns:
true - finished successfully and response data valid false - otherwise
Abort:
none
Note:
"ci" of "+CREG/+CGREG" response changed from 2 bytes to 4 bytes from Release 8. This function work for both 2 bytes and 4 bytes "ci".
